DOC.detailed_description: Emergency contraception ( EC ) provide woman additional line defense unintended pregnancy act unprotected intercourse . An antiprogestin , ulipristal acetate ( UPA ; ellaTM ) , emerge one effective oral option . However , currently lack information regard practical use UPA . Basic science study show UPA bind prevents progesterone receptor work , lead possible concern hormonal contraceptive , like birth control pill , would prevent UPA work . Ideally , woman start regular method birth control soon EC use , may prevent UPA EC work . A woman could delay start regular method birth control still risk pregnancy . This proposal design address gap knowledge focus impact birth control pill UPA 's ability delay ovulation ( release egg ) . The hypothesis start birth control pill shortly UPA adversely impact UPA 's ability delay ovulation .
